author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42778 for the 2023 HI data-taking.

#### PR validation:
The PR has been prepared starting from CMSSW_13_2_3:
```
cmsrel CMSSW_13_2_3
cd CMSSW_13_2_3/src
cmsenv
git cms-init
scram b && scram b code-checks && scram b code-format && scram b
```

[cc: @hjbossi @cfmcginn @ginnocen @icali]
title: [Backport] Fix for proper separation of the ZDCP and ZDCM triggers in the uGT
